content.raw:
So the wind is limited to the horizontal plane, correct? I wonder if we will want to expand this to 3D in the future. Not sure if it's a good idea to declare it as a vector3 here but only handle the horizontal component for now...?

(I'm saying this before looking at the implementation, it might not make sense to have a wind vector)
content.html:
